com.hp.opencall.jmsc.test
Class TestBase.EventWaiter<E extends javax.media.mscontrol.MediaEvent<?>>

java.lang.Object
  com.hp.opencall.jmsc.test.TestBase.EventWaiter<E>
Enclosing class:
TestBase
public static class TestBase.EventWaiter<E extends javax.media.mscontrol.MediaEvent<?>>
extends java.lang.Object

Provide a synchronous wait on MediaEvent reception.
Provide also a few utility methods, like checking that no event is received for a given duration, discard an event if any.

failIfEvent

public void failIfEvent(long timeout)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Wait synchronously on the reception of an Event, and assert if it is received.
This method is actually checking that an Event is not received in the timeout timeframe.

waitForOKEvent

public E waitForOKEvent(long timeout)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
Wait synchronously on the reception of an Event.
Assert that getError() returns Error.NO_ERROR.

Parameters:
timeout - after timeout milliseconds, assert and exit.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

waitForEventID

public E waitForEventID(javax.media.mscontrol.EventType eventID)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
Wait synchronously on the reception of an Event, and assert that the eventID is correct.
Timeout is 5 seconds.
Assert also that getError() returns Error.NO_ERROR.

Parameters:
eventID - The expected eventID
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
